New Records: Lonzo Ball recorded 11 points, 3 rebounds, and 3 assists in 24 minutes against the Cleveland Cavaliers
Key Match Events: Lonzo Ball orchestrated key plays, including a pass leading to Zach LaVine's layup, and contributed defensively against Darius Garland and bigger players
Post-Match Reflections: Billy Donovan chose to rest Lonzo Ball in the fourth quarter, highlighting his trust in the young guard
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lonzo Ball received a standing ovation and showed no rust in his return after nearly three years
